sentences.chinese: 這是一件做工非常考究的衣服。

sentences.english: At present, China University of sophisticated internal power needs of the recovery back.

sentences.english: I liked him. He was always well-dressed and smart-looking.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡他，他一向穿着考究，看上去很時髦。

sentences.english: Designer clothes, after all, are simply made well.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，設計師的衣服確實做工考究。

sentences.english: She's extremely house-proud, keeping all the things hanging on the wall in high tastes.
sentences.chinese: 她特別講究家裏的擺設，牆上掛的東西都是很考究的。

sentences.english: Owing to the carefully selected materials used and the great attention paid to weaving and printing, they possess a very attractive appearance as well as novel designs.
sentences.chinese: 選料考究，紡織和印花工藝嚴格，款式美觀新穎。

sentences.english: Look at how the Dead Sea Scrolls were scrutinized.
sentences.chinese: 回想一下吧，死海羊皮卷是如何被深入考究的。

sentences.english: The well-made costume is prepared for the opera to be shown.
sentences.chinese: 這件做工考究的戲裝是爲即將上演的歌劇準備的。

sentences.english: He got a well-tailored suit as his birthday present.
sentences.chinese: 他的生日禮物是一件做工考究的西裝。

sentences.english: For men to search their own glory is not glory.
sentences.chinese: 考究自己的榮譽，也是可厭的。

sentences.english: The wise men will seek out the wisdom of all the ancients, and will be occupied in the prophets.
sentences.chinese: 明智人必考究歷代古人的智慧，必專務先知的預言。

sentences.english: Besides, we have the best tailors. All the dresses they made are well-tailored.
sentences.chinese: 而且我們有最好的裁縫，他們做的衣服都非常考究。

sentences.english: Premium products from decent factories, tested and verified material, advanced technology.
sentences.chinese: 大廠產品，材料考究，工藝精良，技術先進。

sentences.english: Select material fastidious is another of bright type furniture outstanding characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 選材考究是明式傢俱的另一個突出特點。

sentences.english: Grooming and personal hygiene have been around for ages.
sentences.chinese: 儀容整潔和個人衛生的考究已經行之有年了。

sentences.english: Since I gained weight,I can't get into my best suit.
sentences.chinese: 由於我長胖了，我最考究的西服穿不上了。
